mapper.select: SELECT tb.trip_boardID, tb.nick, tb.title, tb.start_date, tb.end_date, tb.input_date, r.region, d.img as firstImageUrl, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM trip_board_recom WHERE trip_boardID = tb.trip_boardID) as recom_count, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM trip_comment WHERE trip_boardID = tb.trip_boardID) as comment_count FROM trip_board tb INNER JOIN region r ON tb.regionID = r.regionID LEFT JOIN trip_plan tp ON tb.trip_boardID = tp.trip_boardID AND tp.trip_day = 1 AND tp.visit_order = 1 LEFT JOIN course c ON tp.trip_planID = c.trip_planID LEFT JOIN DSTNT d ON c.DSTNTID = d.DSTNTID WHERE tb.status = 'Y' ORDER BY tb.input_date DESC FETCH FIRST 12 ROWS ONLY

SELECT tb.trip_boardID, tb.nick, tb.title, tb.start_date, tb.end_date, tb.input_date, r.region, d.img as firstImageUrl, NVL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM trip_board_recom WHERE trip_boardID = tb.trip_boardID), 0) as recom_count, NVL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM trip_comment WHERE trip_boardID = tb.trip_boardID AND status = 'Y'), 0) as comment_count FROM trip_board tb INNER JOIN region r ON tb.regionID = r.regionID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT tp.trip_boardID, MIN(tp.trip_planID) as trip_planID FROM trip_plan tp WHERE tp.trip_day = 1 AND tp.visit_order = 1 GROUP BY tp.trip_boardID ) tp ON tb.trip_boardID = tp.trip_boardID LEFT JOIN course c ON tp.trip_planID = c.trip_planID LEFT JOIN DSTNT d ON c.DSTNTID = d.DSTNTID WHERE tb.status = 'Y' AND tb.nick = #{nick} ORDER BY tb.input_date DESC
